notes: All inter-city transportation options researched using Gaode Maps API for real-time China domestic routes. Flight details confirmed in booking records (CA4509 Chengdu-Shanghai, MU5129 Shanghai-Beijing already booked). Local transportation info compiled from metro system documentation and routing APIs. Beijing-Tianjin day trip is highly recommended - only 30 min by frequent high-speed trains. Book all high-speed trains 2-3 weeks in advance via 12306 app. Metro is cheapest option in all cities. Didi essential for airport transfers and tight schedules. Early morning departure Day 8 (Shanghai-Beijing flight 09:05) requires 06:00 hotel departure.
